title: Dr. Scott Hahn - The Book of Exodus (12-Disc Bible Study)
description: Dr. Scott Hahn - The Book of Exodus (12-Disc Bible Study) In this remarkable Bible study Dr. Hahn explains why understanding Exodus is absolutely crucial for all Christians - because it is the primary paradigm of how God saves humanity! As you listen to these enlightening CDs you will come to see God's larger purpose in leading the children of Israel out of slavery in Egypt to establish the Mosaic Covenant at Sinai. And how the covenant that God makes with His people at Sinai is precisely the covenant that Christ comes to fulfill! Virtually the whole Bible is explained in terms of the events in Exodus. Christ is both the New Moses and the Paschal Lamb offered at the Passover, while the Church is the New Israel. Order this riveting series now and experience the people and events of Exodus fulfilled in your Catholic Faith! "If you want to understand your Catholic-Christian faith, you have to spend some time in Exodus." -Dr. Scott Hahn https://saintjoe.com/products/the-book-of-exodus See also: --Dr. Scott Hahn - Genesis 1-22: The Covenant As a Family Affair (7-disc Bible study + PDF course guide) https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/11977552 --Dr. Scott Hahn - The Gospel of Matthew (12-Disc Bible Study) https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/18089641 --Dr. Scott Hahn - The Gospel of Mark (5-Disc Bible Study) https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/18090280 --Dr. Scott Hahn - The Gospel of Luke (6-Disc Bible Study) https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/18090355 --Dr. Scott Hahn - The Gospel of John (15-Disc Bible Study) https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/18090570 --The End: A Scott Hahn Bible Study in the Book of Revelation (11-part audio course + PDF study guide) https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/15623444 --- If you enjoy this media, please seed and purchase a physical copy to support the producers and share with family and friends. For more Catholic ebooks, audiobooks, audio presentations, movies & video, visit https://thepiratebay.org/user/catholicstuff/
